metadata.title: CVE-2024-46821 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:drm/amd/pm: Fix negative array index readAvoid using the negative valuesfor clk_idex as an index into an array pptable->DpmDescriptor.V2: fix clk_index return check (Tim Huang)

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'ESM criteria, was needed').
